question: Who was appointed the new Prime Minister of Mali?
explanation: Soumeylou Boubeye Maiga was appointed the new Prime Minister of Mali. Ibrahim Boubacar Keita, President of Mali, appointed Soumeylou Boubeye Maiga as the new prime minister of Mali. Soumeylou Boubeye Maiga is a former defense and foreign minister and intelligence chief. He replaces Abdoulaye Idrissa Maiga.
